FROM python:3.7-slim-buster

RUN apt update && apt -y --no-install-recommends install ruby ruby-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN gem install gazer

COPY . /app
WORKDIR /app
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir .
WORKDIR /
ENTRYPOINT ["ldeploy"]
